p: 200 g of fresh H. arborescens leaves was placed into the reactor without addition of any solvent. Microwave extraction was performed using a Milestone MAO20-A apparatus; a multimode microwave reactor 2.45 GHz with a maximum delivered power of 500 W variable in 5 W increments. The essential oil was completely extracted at atmospheric pressure and 99.85°C (373 K) within 30 min; collected, and subjected to GC-MS analysis.
